metadata.synopsis: Cinematic Cutscene with the character using an elevator to get from the Zhentarim Hideout to the Underdark
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 248 -1904. SetGlobalOsirisFlag PLA_ZhentDungeon_State_LiftFixed5. Click on the lift.6. ReCon: "oe und_cine_reset" -  this will allow to see the cinematic again when clicking on the lift (by default the game shows it only once)
